name: Generic Medicine
description: Generic drug is a medication created to be the same as an existing approved brand-name drug in dosage form

name: Health check and screening
description: Various Essential and Affordable Health Screening Packages cater to Individual Needs. Reliable Health Screening with Caring is available

name: Vaccination
description: Vaccination is a simple, safe, and effective way of protecting people against harmful diseases, before they come into contact with us.

name: Medicine Consultation
description: The medical consultation is best understood. In a typical consultation the doctor elicits information from the patient, then offers a diagnosis may also discuss and offer treatment.

name: Doctor Receipt
description: The medical bill receipt is one that a doctor's office or other medical institution will issue following the payment of an invoice.

name: Pharmacy Store
description: Retail and clinical pharmacists both help patients get the medications they need and provide important guidance on medication usage and interactions
